kpi.name: M8006C8

kpi_info.title: EPC initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to Radio Network Layer cause
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to the Radio Network Layer cause. Each bearer of the "E-RAB to be Released List" IE is counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi.kpi_alias: EPC initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to Radio Network Layer cause
